result.longName: Arkan Al-Kuwait Real Estate Company K.S.C.P.

assetProfile.address2: Floor 66 Shuhada Street, Sharq PO Box 20678
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Arkan Al-Kuwait Real Estate Company K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiary, Arkan Al-Kuwait for Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Company S.C.P., provides real estate services primarily in Kuwait. It offers real estate investment and development, management of real estate funds. It also owns, manages, operates, invests, rents, and leases hotels, clubs, health clubs, motels, entertainment houses, rest houses, parks, fairs, restaurants, cafeterias, compounds, tourist facilities, health resorts, sports and entertainment projects. The company also provides property management services, including drafting the rent contracts with tenants and occupants, collecting rents, security, cleaning, guarding for buildings, managing real estate services, and maintenance service requests, including civil, mechanical, and electrical contracting activities as well as marketing, financial reporting, maintenance contract, legal support, and public auction services. Additionally, it offers development of infrastructure projects for residential, commercial and industrial areas under the BOT system. It serves residential homes, towers, offices, commercial complexes, and warehouses. Arkan Al-Kuwait Real Estate Company K.S.C.P. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
